name: Generic idle game no. 674054
description:
My first ever jam game made for the GTMK 2020 game jam. (Solo made)

You don't control the character, only it's stats. Upgrade your character to earn more. It gets more difficult by time, but there is no hidden boss, etc. This is all I had time for, nothing fancy, but hope you like it.

Thanks for taking a look! Have a nice day!

All code was written in 48 hours. The visuals for the buttons and icons are from Michsky Modern UI Pack, and music from Ultimate Game Music collection. I have rights to use both of them and they are available in the Asset Store.
